Header: Train operations between Colombo and Talaimannar resume after 25 years
Content: Train operations between Talaimannar and Colombo will commence on Wednesday after a span of twenty five years. The Department of Railways noted that the first train will leave the Fort Railway Station at 7:40 p.m. Meanwhile. a new train operation from Homagama to Fort, Colombo on the Kelaniweli railway line commenced at 7.20 on Wednesday morning.
